formalpara.title: Develop a plan for certification testing of the software increment
formalpara.para: Develop a test plan, including schedules, staffing, training, hardware and software environment, certification goals, use of statistical test cases, use of operational input, procedures for verifying correct software performance, and documentation.

glossdef.para: Define the test plan to ensure experimental control, including test procedures, test monitoring, results recording, failure evaluation, and engineering change control.
Plan for additional testing techniques to be applied in conjunction with statistical testing as necessary.
Document testing plans in the Increment Test Plan work product.
